participant_1.background:
I made my mom a dress for her birthday and she loved it!
i m insecure.
I hide things from my family to protect them.
I read up on the history of my city in preparation for a visit from my best friend.
i do not have a lot of friends.

participant_2.background:
I like to spend time with my kids and watch them grow like my sunflowers.
my bestfriend is from out of town.
I don't always see eye to eye with my dad, but we're still close.
I enjoy serving my community.
i am a soccer mom.

content.text: Hello! How is your morning going?
Good morning! My morning is going well so far. I am getting ready for my soccer mom duties.
Nice! I love kids! I hope they have a great day at school.
Thanks! My son is in first grade and my daughter is in kindergarten.
Oh wow! That is great! I am looking forward to becoming a mom one day.
It is definitely a life changing experience. I would not trade it for the world.
I am glad to hear that! I have not met my best friend yet, but she is coming from out of town to visit soon.
That is great! I love spending time with my best friend. We do everything together.
Nice! I am excited to meet her and learn more about her.
I am sure you two will get along great. What are your hobbies?
I love reading, writing, and baking.
Wow! I love reading and baking as well!
